concept.title: Network interface setup on Windows Vista and windows 7

conbody.p: The System properties window ( ) will appear on your screen. Click on the Device Manager link located in the left column of the window.
Device Manager window ( ) should appear on your screen. Expand the network adapters sub-menu and double click your network adapter name (for example Intel(R) PRO/1000 MT Desktop Adapter).
Select the Power management tab in the Network Adapter Properties window ( ) and set the following properties:

row.entry: Allow this device to wake computer
Only allow a magic packet to wake the computer

conbody.p: This property is necessary to turn on the student computer remotely from the teacher workstation.
conbody.note: It may also be necessary to add Dialog Nibelung into the Windows Firewall list of trusted software, as well as perform appropriate adjustments to other firewall and anti virus software installed on the computer.
